Reviews.Title: Fair
Reviews.Author: Robert K. Laird
Reviews.Content: The shade works but not near as well as I expected.  I took pictures at a classic car show last week (bright sun) and cut off some of the cars by about 1/10th of the car.  Very disappointing product.  Also the price of the shade was five dollars and some cents and the shipping was five dollars and some cents.  Bad news! Never again!

Reviews.Title: Just Right
Reviews.Author: owllen
Reviews.Content: It worked just as I hoped ti would.  It fit right and shaded the display adequately.  I am happy with it!

Reviews.Title: What the camera shoud have come with..
Reviews.Author: Willy1670
Reviews.Content: This one is installed on my wifes Fujifilm A330. It seems strange that the camera manufacturers didn't think of this for their products as an accessory or installed from the box. Allows the screen to be clearly seen in every light situationshe has run across so far, and the price was great. The fitment is perfect. The camera still fits it's case and it blends in with the camera so well it looks like it is OEM.

Reviews.Title: What do you expect for $10?
Reviews.Author: Brian Weeden
Reviews.Content: Does what it's supposed to. Were I a professional photographer, my demands would most likely be greater--I'm not, & I doubt if most buyers are either. It's good value for the price, but check around--prices vary quite a bit!

Reviews.Title: Works but Breaks Easy
Reviews.Author: Tv
Reviews.Content: I helps block out the sun but still hard to see screen on bright days. Worked like it said but very light weight and breaks easy. (coloradodeer.com)
